r.s: A effective,fast,stable log extension for PHP.
r.d: A effective,fast,stable log extension for PHP. - In the PHP project, for convenient record log - The default log directory and module configuration. - Specify the log directory and get the current configuration - Analysis of early warning framework preliminary - Buffer debug efficient log buffer, convenient - With PSR-3 Logger interface
r.n: - Fixed init config error with ZTS - Fixed SeasLog::analyzerDetail() function compatible with CentOS
